message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you a product for $100. As you know, I've sold many products so far, and I'm proud to say that 80% of them have been high-quality. However, I'm not going to sugarcoat it - this product is not one of the high-quality ones. But I believe it still has some value, and I'm willing to let it go for the same price as my high-quality products. Take a chance and see what you think!
I appreciate the transparency and the fair pricing. Given the statistics and your assurance, I'm willing to take the risk and purchase the product.
